selectSettings.title: Settings Configuration
selectSettings.subtitle: Choose which settings you would like to configure. You can manage your general restaurant settings or marketplace-specific configurations.

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.description: Configure restaurant information, occasions, working hours, roles, and other general settings.

marketplaceSettings.title: Marketplace Settings
marketplaceSettings.description: Manage marketplace configurations, and set up your restaurant's presence on the marketplace.

paymentSettings.title: Payment Settings
paymentSettings.alwaysDescription: When payment is always required, a deposit will be requested for all reservations meeting the criteria below.

errors.startDateAfterEnd: Start date cannot be after end date
errors.endDateBeforeStart: End date cannot be before start date

marketplaceSettings.title: Marketplace Settings
marketplaceSettings.chooseSettingPrompt: Choose a marketplace setting to modify

gallery.title: Gallery Management
gallery.description: Manage your restaurant's photo gallery for the marketplace. Upload high-quality images to showcase your restaurant's ambiance, dishes, and facilities.

menu.title: Menu & Pricing
menu.description: Configure your menu items, categories, and average pricing for marketplace display. Set competitive prices and organize your offerings.

offers.title: Offers & Promotions
offers.description: Create and manage special offers, discounts, and promotional campaigns for marketplace customers.

reviews.title: Reviews Management
reviews.description: Monitor and respond to customer reviews from the marketplace. Manage your online reputation and customer feedback.

extraServices.title: Extra Services
extraServices.description: Configure additional services you offer such as delivery, catering, private events, and other premium services.

onlineBookingBlockage.title: Booking Restrictions
onlineBookingBlockage.description: Set up booking restrictions and blackout dates for marketplace reservations. Control availability for online bookings.

unifiedSettings.subtitle: Manage all your restaurant settings from one centralized location

payment.title: Payment
payment.paymentDescription: A payment is required to secure your reservation. Please enter your credit card information below.

payment.billingInfoRequired: Please complete the billing address information

payment.paymentNoticeDescription: A prepayment is required for this reservation.

success.message: Your reservation has been successfully made. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

unavailable.description: Online reservations are currently unavailable. Please contact the restaurant directly.

errors.serverError: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact the restaurant directly.

success.title: Thank you for your review!

paymentSuccess.title: Payment Successful!
paymentSuccess.description: Your payment has been processed successfully and your reservation has been confirmed.

errors.paymentInitiationFailed: Failed to initiate payment. Please try again later.
errors.paymentDisabled: Online payment is not enabled for this restaurant. Please contact the restaurant directly.
errors.reservationNotFound: The reservation was not found. It may have been canceled or already processed.
